name: Kids Karate Groups
des: A maxim in this style of martial art is never attack first. Karate is a great way to teach kids how to be respectful and to focus on defense rather than offense. It can help kids build respect, self-control, and focus.

name: Teen & Adult Karate
des: Martial arts classes are fun, empowering, and provide a great workout for teens and adults. Whether you want to defend yourself, lose weight, or just have fun, our teen and adult martial arts classes have something to offer.

name: Traditional Martial Arts
des: A ‘martial art’ can simply be defined as a form of combat. However, a traditional martial art is different. There has to be an additional aspect to the martial art aside from just the combat instruction.

name: Kick Boxing Group
des: Cardio kickboxing is a group fitness class that combines martial arts techniques with fast-paced cardio. This high-energy workout challenges the beginner and elite athlete alike.
